title: Software Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


This opportunity at Ericsson presents a compelling chance for those passionate about software development, particularly in the realm of next-generation Radio Networks, including 5G and beyond.


Our teams are responsible for full software development flow, from requirement analysis and system studies to customer delivery and maintenance for Ericsson radio system platform.

 **What you will do:**

* Development: Work on solutions for Ericsson Radio System Products with a focus on 5G and future 6G technologies. Engage in software development primarily using C, C++ or Erlang
* Testing: Feature testing and development of automated test cases and suites in Java to ensure product quality.
* Innovation: Explore AI opportunities to effectively develop the SW platform for 6G Radio Access Networks
* Maintenance and Support: Handle maintenance of existing software, manage trouble reports, and provide support in various scenarios, including task forces and cross-departmental assistance
* Engineering Environment: Work with the build systems, development tools and the Continuous Integration environment
* Continuous Improvement: Engage in system studies and contribute to the continuous improvement of products and processes

 **The skills you bring:**

* A degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Telecommunications, or Engineering Physics (M.Sc. or B.Sc. level)
* A genuine interest in programming
* Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technological areas
* Interest in open-source development and proficiency in using contemporary toolkits, from AI agents to GIT
* Interest in integration and test
* Strong communication skills, with proficiency in English
* Willingness to work collaboratively in an Agile team environment
* A keen interest in the telecommunications field
 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: Software Engineer
description:
Despite healthcare spending at an all-time high, patient waiting time is getting longer, and patients aren’t accessing the quality of care they deserve. At Kry, we believe we can play a fundamental role in changing this. For the past seven years, we’ve been on a journey to deliver and fix healthcare, for less. As Europe’s leading digital healthcare provider and one of the largest healthcare providers in Sweden, we believe that providing accessible and affordable healthcare has never been more important. Our vision has been consistent and clear: great healthcare for everyone. Do you share our vision and want to be part of shaping the future of healthcare?
   

  

**The role**
 We are seeking a
 **Software Engineer** 
 to join our Clinician Applications Team. Our mission is to develop key capabilities that empower clinicians to provide the highest standard of care.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 Our challenge for you:
   

  

* Engage with cross-functional teams spanning design, development, product management, and data analysis to build impactful full-stack solutions that drive healthcare forward.
* Contribute to building and optimizing both client-side and server-side features for our applications, prioritizing seamless usability and clean api's"
* Conduct code review process, develop comprehensive tests, and ensure software excellence through iterative improvements.
* Handle infrastructure setup and deployment pipelines with AWS, GitHub Actions, and Terraform.
* Actively engage in technical discussions and information-sharing sessions to support solution optimization.
* Participate in an agile, lightweight Scrum process focused on optimizing tools and workflows to ensure a productive and engaging work environment.
* Is some of this new to you? That’s OK! We believe that great developers can pick up new technologies quickly and we provide support to learn on the job.


**Who You Are**
 Your profile and skills:
   

  

* Experience working with Java and React (Kotlin is a bonus).
* Strong understanding of modern JavaScript, TypeScript, and CSS.
* Strong understanding developing cloud based applications (AWS, Terraform)
* You have experience with web and/or mobile facing clients
* You've worked in an agile environment using scrum
* You want to change the healthcare system by using your passion for tech.
* You like the idea of working in a rapidly growing startup environment.
* You are confident working on a range of languages and frameworks and can quickly adapt to new ones.
* You are familiar with development tools and concepts such as Git and continuous integration/delivery.
* Comfortable working in the English language (written and verbal).


 It is not essential to have all these skills, but an aptitude and willingness to develop those you don’t know is key.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
* Amazing, friendly, smart colleagues from all over the world
* The opportunity to grow and learn from knowledgeable co-workers and cross-collaboration across departments
* Ability to have a big impact on what we build and how we build it
* As a team, committing to goals, sharing both success and failures
* The chance to be a part of the journey of building the future of healthcare
* Committed to supporting a balanced approach to work and personal life.


**Join us and shape your future as well as ours!**
 If you think you’re up to the challenge, come and help us to grow, innovate and develop! A diverse workforce is an absolute necessity for anyone with a vision like ours: to provide great healthcare for everyone. Therefore we celebrate differences and are committed to creating an inclusive environment where all employees can truly belong and thrive. We offer a hybrid way of working where we aim to be at our great office at least 3 days a week to cater for a great relationship with our colleagues.
   

  

**About Kry/Livi**
 Kry/Livi is the European leader in digital healthcare, allowing patients to see a doctor, nurse, or psychologist online within minutes. We also combine digital with physical care, transforming how millions of patients access healthcare. Headquartered in Stockholm, we are committed to improving the world’s health through innovation, one patient at a time. In Sweden and Norway we are called Kry. In the UK and France, we operate under the name Livi.
   

  

**Submissions and Questions**
 Please submit your application by including your CV or LinkedIn. No submission will be accepted via email, nor when the job posting has become inactive. All applications must go via the careers site or an official Kry / Livi job post. If you have any questions regarding jobs or our recruitment process, please read our FAQ. There might be a bit of delay in hearing back from us due to the holiday period, but we will be in touch!

title: Fullstack developer
description:
**A few words from the manager**
*Join a fantastic team that thrives on collaboration and mutual support! At Tele2, one of the key pillars of our long-term strategy is delivering Superior Customer Experience. This team plays a critical role in that mission, focusing on customer tools such as web solutions, mobile apps, and customer service platforms—working across both frontend and backend.*
*We’re on the lookout for a curious and driven senior developer who’s ready to grow and contribute. With great opportunities to learn and develop your skills, this is a chance to take your career to the next level. Sounds like your next challenge? Keep reading!*
 Are you ready to be at the forefront of digital innovation? Join our dynamic team at Tele2, where Digital Capabilities & Technology (DCT) is the engine behind our products and services. As the essential enabler of our commercial ambitions, DCT brings automation and simplicity to the telecommunications industry, revolutionizing the way we connect and communicate.
   

  

 Within our organization, you’ll find everything from the backbone infrastructure of technology and IT systems, serving both our external & internal customers, to advanced analytics, AI creation, and frontend development. Our team plays a vital role in ensuring reliable and premium services through delivering exceptional experiences to our end customers, both Consumer and Enterprises, all the while supporting our colleagues within Tele2.
   

  

**About The Job**
 The team’s product ownership is broad, but the product where we are looking to strengthen the team now is within customer service tools. The solution is built on a microservice architecture and includes microfrontends that the application consumes.
   

  

 The team is DevOps modelled, i.e. responsible for the full development chain from gathering requirements to deploying the code in production and maintaining it. The team interacts with stakeholders to clarify requirements, create detailed design and implement solutions.
   

  

 This role is based at our headquarters in Kista, Stockholm. At Tele2, we embrace a hybrid work model, with the majority of the workweek spent in the office.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 To thrive in this role, we believe that you have:
   

  

* 5+ years of hands-on experience with Java 11+ and JavaScript/TypeScript/React.
* Deep knowledge of Spring technologies within a microservice architecture hosted on Kubernetes.
* Strong experience in CI/CD, including unit and automated testing.
* Proficiency with REST APIs, databases (Oracle/Postgres), and Git.


 We’re looking for an engaged team player who is approachable, values operational tasks as much as building new features, and enjoys collaborating to achieve shared goals. Curiosity is essential—you’re eager to understand the big picture while also diving into the technical details. Experience in large organizations and excellent English and Swedish communication skills (spoken and written) will set you up for success in this role.

title: Software Developer
description:
Join our Team
   

  

**About this opportunity:**
 This opportunity at Ericsson presents a compelling chance for those passionate about software development, particularly in the realm of next-generation Radio Networks, including 5G and beyond.
   

  

 Our teams are responsible for full software development flow, from requirement analysis and system studies to customer delivery and maintenance for Ericsson radio system platform.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Development: Work on solutions for Ericsson Radio System Products with a focus on 5G and future 6G technologies. Engage in software development primarily using C, C++ or Erlang
* Testing: Feature testing and development of automated test cases and suites in Java to ensure product quality.
* Innovation: Explore AI opportunities to effectively develop the SW platform for 6G Radio Access Networks
* Maintenance and Support: Handle maintenance of existing software, manage trouble reports, and provide support in various scenarios, including task forces and cross-departmental assistance
* Engineering Environment: Work with the build systems, development tools and the Continuous Integration environment
* Continuous Improvement: Engage in system studies and contribute to the continuous improvement of products and processes


**The skills you bring:**
* A degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Telecommunications, or Engineering Physics (M.Sc. or B.Sc. level)
* A genuine interest in programming
* Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technological areas
* Interest in open-source development and proficiency in using contemporary toolkits, from AI agents to GIT
* Interest in integration and test
* Strong communication skills, with proficiency in English
* Willingness to work collaboratively in an Agile team environment
* A keen interest in the telecommunications field


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

title: Full Stack and AI Developer Intern
description:
𝐏𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Full Stack and AI Developer Intern
 



 𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Remote
 



 𝐓𝐲𝐩𝐞: Unpaid Internship
 



 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐞: Immediate
 



 𝐃𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: 3-6 months (Flexible, Part-Time or Full-Time)
 



  





 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐧𝐲 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: 
 



 Gaddr is an ambitious startup at the cutting edge of innovation, striving to create a unified platform that transforms how companies manage their operations, projects, and teams. We integrate AI, blockchain, and automation to revolutionize processes, making operations seamless and efficient. As an early-stage startup, we’re in the exciting phase of building our foundation and growing our team.
 



  





 𝐑𝐨𝐥𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧:
 



 This is an internship (remote) role for a Full Stack and AI Developer at Gaddr. The developer will be responsible for tasks such as back-end and front-end web development, software development, and CSS implementation. The role will involve working on various projects remotely.
 



  





 𝐐𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬:
 


* Back-End Web Development, Full-Stack Development, and Software Development skills.
* Front-end development and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Experience with AI development is a plus.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
* Enrolled in a relevant degree program or equivalent experience.



  





 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬:
 


* Build and maintain front-end and back-end features for web applications.
* Implement and optimize AI models to enhance automation within the platform.
* Develop responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
* Integrate APIs and handle server-side functionality.
* Work with team members on new features and participate in code reviews.
* Maintain project documentation and stay current with tech trends.



  





 𝐖𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐖𝐞 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫:
 


* Real-World Experience: Engage in hands-on digital marketing and growth strategy work in a real-world startup setting.
* Portfolio Development: Build a portfolio with tangible projects that will enhance your career prospects.



  





 𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞: 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐬 𝐚𝐧 𝐮𝐧𝐩𝐚𝐢𝐝 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩. 𝐀𝐬 𝐰𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐥𝐲 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐩, 𝐰𝐞 𝐜𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐭 𝐨𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫 𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐚𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞. 𝐇𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫, 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐤𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐠𝐚𝐢𝐧 𝐰𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐛𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐜𝐚𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐫 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭.
 



  





 𝐒𝐮𝐦𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐲 𝐨𝐟 𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐏𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐬:
 


* Unpaid Position: This internship is unpaid, but offers a valuable experience in a startup environment.
* Remote Work: This is a fully remote position, allowing you to work from anywhere.
* Duration: We are flexible with the duration and can accommodate both part-time and full-time candidates.



  





 If you’re excited about joining a startup in its early stages and making a meaningful impact, we’d love to hear from you!
 



  





 #Startup hashtag

title: Disrupting fullstack developer
description:
**#Wearegrowing!** 




  





**Company Description** 




 Geofy envisions a future where every homeowner has control over their energy needs and is essentially self-sufficient in energy and electricity. Currently, few households have the opportunity to become self-sufficient in energy and electricity. Geofy's energy subscription provides all households with a simple solution to this complex problem.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full-time on-site role for a Disrupting Fullstack Developer at Geofy in Stockholm. The role involves day-to-day tasks related to react, node.js, python, IOT devices integrations, MQTT queues and a lot of AI models and data analysis.
 



  





 A plus for dart/flutter mobile development as well as expo/react native.
 



  





 If you dont fit the bill perfectly, dont worry. We are learning as well!
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Senior Full-stack js with focus on backend
* Can-do mentality
* Experience with energy or sustainability projects is a plus
* Preferred Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or similar work experience.



  





**NOTE: We like to work together, so being in Stockholm office daily is key.**

title: Senior Node.js Developer
description:
At Anyfin HQ, nestled in the vibrant heart of Stockholm, we’re on a mission to transform the financial world. By equipping people with smart, innovative tools, we’re changing how individuals manage their financial well-being on an international scale. Our vision is clear and powerful: to improve the financial health of every individual, one debt at a time.
   

  

**About Us:** 
 Since our inception in 2017, we’ve helped thousands of Swedes, Finns, Germans, and Norwegians take back control of their finances, saving millions by refinancing costly consumer credit. But this is just the beginning. With new markets to conquer, cutting-edge tools, and ambitious products on the horizon, we are constantly seeking new ways to elevate people’s financial situations. And to reach these bold goals, we need passionate and talented individuals like you.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 As a
 **Senior Node.js Developer** 
 at Anyfin, you’ll dive deep into building and optimizing complex financial backend systems. You’ll be part of a fast-paced startup environment, collaborating with driven colleagues who thrive on innovation. Our team values growth, diversity, and adaptability, and you’ll have the chance to contribute to impactful projects from your very first day.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Specialize in backend development, utilizing Node.js and SQL to build robust and scalable financial systems.
* Tackle complex coding challenges, crafting new backend solutions, and refining existing ones.
* Work with TypeScript, GraphQL, Postgres, and occasionally touch on React, but the backend will be your primary focus.
* Contribute to the design and architecture of financial platforms, ensuring the scalability and reliability of our systems.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to shape both product and business strategies.
* Share your backend expertise with the team, championing best practices and continuous learning.


**Who You Are**
* Proficient in Node.js and backend in general. Experience with SQL databases (preferably Postgres) is essential.
* You have a passion for solving intricate backend problems, especially in high-stakes environments like finance.
* At least 5 years of professional experience in software development. Experience with financial systems is a huge plus.
* A good understanding of system design, clean code, and pragmatic problem-solving.
* Bonus points if you’re familiar with React, Python, Go, GraphQL,Kubernetes, Google Cloud/AWS or DevOps with Github Actions but your backend experience will take center stage here.


**Why Join Us?** 
 We promise you’ll be challenged and pushed to develop your skill set, all while working alongside a talented and ambitious team. Though we’ve made significant strides, the most exciting part of our journey is just beginning. Plus, we offer competitive compensation, a cozy centrally-located office, extra time off on your birthday, and many other benefits we’ll tell you about when we meet.
   

  

 Are you ready to be a key player in revolutionizing financial well-being? We can’t wait to receive your application!
   

  

 We believe that innovation thrives in person, so we work from the office four days a week to foster collaboration and creativity.
   

  

**Please note that we are not offering relocation support for this position.**
 Anyfin is a Swedish fintech on a mission to improve financial well-being and revolutionize debt management. We empower consumers to reduce the costs of high-interest loans, get a detailed overview of their fixed costs, and see their credit score.

title: Tech Lead Manager
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
**Are you a skilled backend software developer ready to grow into a leadership role while staying hands-on in technology?** 
 Join us as a Tech Lead Manager, where you'll lead an empowered development team delivering scalable components for data optimization, billing, account management, and product configuration tooling.
   

  

 This role offers a perfect blend of leadership and technical contributions, giving you the opportunity to guide a team of developers while actively shaping the technical direction.
   

  

**Responsabilities**
* Define clear goals, coach your team members, and foster a collaborative, growth-oriented environment.
* Work closely with your product partner to plan and build the right solutions at the right time.
* Stay hands-on by contributing to backend development, driving DevOps practices, and supporting code reviews, testing, and quality assurance.
* Manage salaries, performance, and career development for your team members.
* Ensure high-quality, timely delivery of technical solutions that meet business needs.
* Balance people leadership with strong technical contributions, making yourself a go-to resource for the team.


**Requirements**
* Strong experience in backend development such as .NET or Java technologies.
* Hands-on knowledge of DevOps practices, including CI/CD and infrastructure as code, and Kubernetes.
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud
* Experience with code reviews, testing, and ensuring software quality.
* Proven leadership experience or a strong desire to grow into a management role.
* Excellent communication skills in English, with the ability to align stakeholders.
* A collaborative, goal-oriented mindset with the ability to inspire and support your team.


 Embrace the challenge and join us!
   

  

**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Senior Fullstack Developer
description:
Imagine; every day being part of shaping the future for thousands of students and teachers by developing the latest EdTech platforms. If that sounds exciting, stop imagining and join our team!
 



  





*While we're already aiding over 200,000 students yearly through our market leading EdTech platform Trelson Assessment, our growth journey has just begun. We are therefore looking to expand our small tech department with a senior fullstack developer. We offer you a social and inspiring workplace where we develop benchmarking products together. Let's get started, let’s make a difference!* 




  




**What you will do** 

 As a senior fullstack developer at Online Partner, you will work with web development and the holistic product life cycle: design, implementation, testing, releasing, and maintenance. You will work closely with the team and be part of influencing the architectural decisions for the products. With your senior experience, you will operate as a mentor for other team members who are excited to grow their fullstack experience. Moreover, you will be:
 


* Developing intuitive front-end applications using Vue.JS and JavaScript
* Developing API:s and services using mostly Python
* Working with Google Cloud Platform.
* Granted access to several Online Courses for Google Partners connected to Cloud Dev.



 Besides contributing to the development of our team and our processes, you would be working with the department's short- and long-term projects. You focus at Online Partner will be the development of Trelson. Information about Trelson can be found here.
 



  




**About you** 

 If you're a skilled developer who loves coding and thrives when working in small dynamic organizations, this is the place for you. Preferably, you have worked as a full-stack developer for several years, or worked in frontend for a few and fullstack an additional few. Beyond that, we imagine that you have some of the following points on your resumé:
 


* Several years of experience working in JavaScript
* Experience working in Vue.JS (or equivalent frameworks)
* Worked with cloud-based platforms such as GCP, AWS, Azure
* Great verbal and written communication skills in English.



 Good verbal and written skills in Swedish are commendable, as is experience in Python or related languages. 
 



  
 


**About Online Partner AB** 

 We are a Stockholm-based company, with our contemporary headquarters located by the waterfront at Liljeholmen. Here at Online Partner, we are specialists in Google's cloud-based solutions, and since 2010, we have been a certified Google Partner. We are currently in an exciting scale-up phase with our in-house developed EdTech products. We already hold a significant market share in the Scandinavian market with a growing international user base. At Online Partner, we also encourage learning and collaboration with our partners to get the best training possible, and we invite all our developers to obtain professional certificates. 
 



  




**We are looking forward to your application!**

title: React Native Developer
description:
We’re a cutting-edge tech-enabled bank on a mission to revolutionize financing for small businesses across 7 markets in northern Europe. Our innovative solutions aim to simplify access to financing and enable growth for small businesses. As we scale, we are now looking for a React Native Developer to be part of our journey to transform the financial landscape for entrepreneurs.
 



  





**About the role** 




 As a React Native Developer at Qred, you’ll be part of the team working with applications for existing customers together with other mobile app developers, frontend web developers, UX designers and a Product Manager. With your focus on React Native, you will play an important part in building and improving our mobile app to handle more features, customers and markets. The team is expected to take full ownership of how our products are presented and working, which means you’ll be part of planning, implementing, reviewing, testing and releasing software continuously as well as monitoring that it’s working as intended.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* **Collaborate within a team:** 
 Work closely with everyone in your team to find the best solutions and ensure we meet our goals.
* **Ensure quality:** 
 Take responsibility for the quality of your work by creating and running tests as well as review the work of others to ensure the team produces good quality software.
* **Drive innovation:** 
 With a DevOps mindset, improve our workflows and contribute to the optimization of operations and delivery.
* **Promote security and performance:** 
 Ensure our systems are secure and perform at their best, even as our user base grows.



  





**Requirements** 



* **Mobile app development skills:** 
 Proven knowledge and at least 5 years of experience in writing, releasing and maintaining mobile applications.
* **Architecture responsibility:** 
 Previous responsibility for maintaining platform architecture for mobile apps.
* **Quality focus:** 
 You are comfortable writing and executing tests for your own code as well as reviewing code to ensure that the entire team produces good software.
* **Communication and collaboration:** 
 You like working within a team, enjoy sharing knowledge and contribute to building a strong team spirit.
* **Language skills:** 
 You are comfortable using English as your working language and understand the importance of clear communication in an international team.



  





**Why join us?** 




  





 This is a unique opportunity to join a growing fintech company that is redefining financial services for small businesses in Northern Europe. You’ll work with a passionate and innovative team, participating in creating an environment where employees thrive and contribute to a shared vision of success.
 



  





**One last thing** 




 This is a full-time, permanent position based in Stockholm. Don’t wait to send in your application, we are reviewing applications on a rolling basis. While the start date is flexible, the right candidate can join us immediately.
 



*Qred celebrates diversity and does not discriminate based on ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law.*

title: Full Stack Developer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished full-stack software developer with a demonstrated ability to deliver innovative solutions. Your exceptional programming skills and experience in building complex applications position you to tackle significant challenges within the tech industry. You possess a strong problem-solving aptitude and a passion for pioneering cutting-edge technologies. Driven to make a real impact, you're eager to leverage your expertise in building disruptive tech ventures.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we’re looking for someone who:** 



* Having the autonomy to develop sophisticated software solutions to address real-world challenges, merging ingenuity with functionality.
* Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills, capable of breaking down complex issues and bringing structure into business cases
* Providing leadership, whether it’s directing a development team or managing comprehensive product delivery.
* You have an idea that you believe can solve a problem you are deeply interested in. You understand that you need co-pilots who share your vision and values.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Antler Success Stories** 




 Several companies built through the Antler program have received pre-seed investment and have gone on to secure significant funding rounds. Here are just a few examples:
 


* **Wingbits:** 
 A community-driven flight data tracking platform
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating the identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

title: Tech Lead Manager
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 You will act as both Tech Lead and Manager, in a perfect mix of leading people (Team of Developers) and developing code. Our aim is to consolidate the team of developers that you will lead in Stockholm. You will collaborate with your Product Partner, regarding planning and building the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for defining clear goals for your team and lead them in delivering on those goals.
   

  

 Apart from this, you are also responsible for setting salaries, helping individuals on your team grow and developing, as well as contributing technically to the team.
   

  

 As Tech Lead Manager you have a holistic perspective and the ability to inspire and lead others. You love working with tech and have experience working as a developer, working with code reviews, testing and quality assurance. You have at least one area where your team can rely on you making strong technical contributions.
   

  

* Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders
* Define quarterly goals and do weekly follow-ups
* Support and make sure the team members are the best they can be
* Develop and coach your team members individually
* Facilitate daily stand-ups and advise on agile WoW
* Contribute technically (wherever your strong area is) to the team


**Requirements**
* MSc/BS in computer science or similar degree
* Experience working as a Manager for a Tech Team
* Working in different contexts and organisations
* Interest in leadership and developing teams
* Proficient in English, both verbal and written
* Business minded and able to see the big picture
* A natural leader who is caring and inspiring
* Able to communicate clearly, both with your team and stakeholders
* Well organized and goal oriented


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: BI Developer
description:
**Assignment description:**
 The Data & Analytics (D&A) team is in the process of migrating their current Data Warehouse to a Data Lakehouse. We need a BI Developer to support assessing the current workloads and data, then support the migration.
   

  

 The current Data Warehouse was built 15 years ago for Financial Reporting. Since then, the scope of the application has expanded to providing reports to the whole organization with some operational processes supported as well. The Data Warehouse has been built using Microsoft technologies, both on-prem and Cloud based.
   

  

**Migration work includes:**
* Logically mapping the current Data Warehouse.
* Modelling the existing Data Warehouse and Data Marts.
* Migrating existing reporting solutions.
* Decommissioning the remaining reporting solutions.


**Requirements:**
* An experienced BI Developer who has been working with the Azure technology stack for at least five years.
* Technical platforms we work with include Microsoft BI Stack (Power BI, SQL Server, SSIS, SSAS, SSRS), Azure (Data Factory, Functions, DevOps, etc.), and tools like Visual Studio and Redgate.
* Experience in technical roles within cloud and data environments.
* Hands-on experience with best practices in implementing data-driven solutions using Azure and big data technologies.
* Proficiency in data modelling, ETL processes, and data warehouse concepts.
* Familiarity with Azure DevOps and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Java
description:
**About Mynt** 




 Mynt is an all-in-one corporate card and spend management solution, on a mission to fundamentally change business banking forever. Our digital software, coupled with corporate cards and payments infrastructure, eradicates manual administrative tasks for businesses. Experiencing huge growth in the Swedish and Finnish markets, we have recently secured substantial funding to fuel our expansion both in Sweden and internationally.
 



  





 Mynt is a tech-first company with a product oriented mindset, empowering team to be their best in ideating and creating innovative solutions to complex problems. In 2021, Mynt obtained financial license as an e-money institution, card issuer, and payment processor from the Swedish Financial Supervisory Authority.
 



  





 In 2022, we announced a partnership with Fortnox, integrating corporate cards within their platform. Early in 2023, a similar card-issuing partnership was announced with Accountor Group in Finland. Additional partnerships are in progress and under development.
 



  





 Joining Mynt means contributing to creating an exceptional product and company. We seek passionate individuals who thrive in a fast-paced environment, prioritizing customer value. With around 70 employees (and growing fast), we plan to further expand our team to support our growth.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We are looking for top developers who have a passion for development and thrive in an entrepreneurial environment where there is a great opportunity to influence results and the company's progress. With us, you will develop in a modern codebase using the latest technologies and take on significant personal responsibility.
 



  





 You will become part of an ambitious team consisting of several developers with senior backgrounds and knowledge from the scale-up, finance, and consulting industries. At Mynt, we work in agile sprints, closely together but with a high degree of freedom.
 



  





 As a Senior Java developer, you will build business logic and APIs (app and web) in close collaboration with product managers for each area. We work according to agile principles, with clean code and CI/CD. Testing, TDD, and automation are a natural part of the process that ensures agility.
 



  





 You will also be part of the architecture process where you get to help develop new products. You are offered the opportunity to build a new product at an exciting stage using the latest technologies, such as Java, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Amazon AWS, Docker, CircleCI.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Bachelor/Engineering degree or equivalent
* At least 5+ years of experience in back-end development using Java
* Ability to write well-documented, clean code
* You truly enjoy finding innovative solutions together with your team
* Fluent in Swedish and English



  





**What we can offer you** 



* Be part of an amazing team in a fast-growing scale-up.
* Work closely with a fun, high-performing team.
* Enjoy a flexible working environment with a great office location in central Stockholm.
* Shape your own development and responsibilities based on your passion and interest.



  





*The position will be filled as soon as we find a suitable candidate. Please reach out to us as soon as possible if you believe this for you!*

title: Software Engineer - Cross-platform C++ - Multipass
description:
Use your deep C++ skills on Windows and MacOS to build an amazing open source developer experience with Multipass, the workstation mini-cloud at your fingertips which provides Ubuntu and appliance VMs on demand for build, test and prototyping. The Multipass team is hiring a Software Engineer to join our distributed team. We greatly value quality in our code, and great user experience.
   

  

 Multipass is published for macOS, Windows, and also Linux. Think of it as a workstation mini-cloud. At its simplest you can simply say
 **multipass launch** 
 and you will get a new VM on your workstation. You can feed that VM data, just as you would on a public cloud like AWS, Azure or GCP.
   

  

 The goal is not to be a full cloud of course. The goal is to give developers a local cloud on their workstation, which they can use to run builds in the background, or to try cloud appliances, or to test their own cloud deployments and cloud-init scripts, free of charge. People sometimes use it as a build farm on a shared server, for example.
   

  

 As a Software Engineer you are expected to play a leadership role designing, mentoring, reviewing and of course coding.
   

  

***Location***
 : This is a remote position available in the EMEA region only.
   

  

 What you will focus on
   

  

* Ensure Multipass is easy and intuitive to use
* Architect new features and design the user experience
* Write high-quality code to create new features and fix bugs
* Review code and architecture as part of Canonical's engineering process
* Collaborate proactively with a distributed team
* Debug, track down and fix issues encountered by our users
* Foster the open source community and support customers when needed
* Travel internationally for up to two weeks, twice a year, for company events


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Cross-platform development experience on macOS and/or Windows
* Expertise in modern C++ development
* Experience with software testing and test-driven development
* Extremely high personal standards for code quality, testing and design
* Knowledge of hypervisor technologies such as Hyper-V, VirtualBox, KVM, and QEMU
* Open source experience and involvement
* Knowledge of CI systems a plus
* Capacity to learn quickly about new systems and techniques
* Excellent communication skills in English - both verbal and written
* Bachelor's or equivalent in Computer Science, STEM or similar degree


 What we offer you
   

  

 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

 Canonical is an equal opportunity employer
   

  

 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: .NET Developer CRM
description:
Om rollen
   

  

**Utvecklare på Sopra Steria – skapa framtidens lösningar med oss!**
 Hos oss på Sopra Steria arbetar du med alla delar av utvecklingsprocessen, från koncept till implementation och förvaltning. Du får bryta ner komplexa problem och skapa anpassade lösningar till kunder med den allra senaste tekniken, med grund i Microsofts hela portfölj av tjänster. Som utvecklare i .NET rör vi oss över hela stacken, vilket gör att arbetsuppgifterna under en vecka kan variera. Att arbeta med Microsofts paraply av molntjänster, som dessutom ständigt utökas, gör att du kan bli specialist inom ditt kompetensområde, men ändå alltid ha mer att lära.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna som utvecklare hos oss kan t.ex. innebära att:
   

  

* Anpassa funktionaliteten i Dynamics CRM genom utveckling av tillägg i C# och klientanpassningar i JavaScript/TypeScript
* Skapa .NET Core-applikationer för att integrera till och från Dynamics CRM
* Skapa low code-lösningar baserat på Power Apps och Power Automate
* Skapa förutsägbara och stabila releaser med verktyg som Azure DevOps, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy m.fl.


**Om dig**
* 3 års erfarenhet som utvecklare backend, C# .NET
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse, Azure eller andra kringliggande tjänster inom området
* God kommunikativ förmåga i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift


**Varför välja Sopra Steria**
* Fokus på kompetensutveckling och din personliga utveckling - vi kallar det för Power of sharing
* Stark företagskultur - utsedda till Sveriges bästa arbetsplats av Great Place to Work
* Många teamleveranser!


**Ansökan**
 Ansök enkelt genom att antingen ladda upp ditt CV eller länka direkt till ditt LinkedIn-konto via annonsen på vår hemsida! Observera att vi inte tar emot ansökningar inkomna via mail.
   

  

 Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller oss som bolag är du välkommen att kontakta Kalle Forsell, [email protected]
   

  

 Sopra Steria har kunder och projekt som kan kräva säkerhetsgodkännande på olika nivåer.
   

  

 Ytterligare information
   

  

 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Utvecklare med nätkunskap – Stockholm, Malmö, Umeå
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 Vi söker dig som kan ta Bahnhofs nätverk till nästa nivå, med mjukvara i fokus. I rollen som utvecklare blir du del av ett team som arbetar med att bygga smartare nätverk, och utveckla avancerade nätverktyg. Redan under din första månad kommer du att få automatisera tjänsteprovisionering, förbättra monitorering och bygga mjukvarukomponenter för nya nätverksarkitekturer. Du kommer att bekanta dig med flera nätverksplattformar och utvecklas inom både frontend- och backendutveckling.
   

  

 Tjänsten utgår från något av Bahnhofs kontor i Stockholm, Malmö eller Umeå.
   

  

 Om dig
   

  

 Tjänsten ställer höga krav på dig som problemlösare och utvecklare. Nätkunskap är avgörande för att lyckas, men även för dig med gedigen erfarenhet finns stora möjligheter att utvecklas och lära dig nya saker. Du tar initiativ till lösningar där det saknas utstakade vägar, och är orädd inför nya utmaningar, plattformar och tekniker. Erfarenhet från liknande roller inom telekom värderas högt.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet inom några av följande områden:
   

  

**Språk** 
 : C, Python, Perl, Go, PHP/Vue.js, Bash
   

  

**Operativsystem** 
 : Linux, Cisco IOS, IOS XE, IOS XR, VRP
   

  

**Koncept/system** 
 : DHCP, CGNAT, K8s, PowerDNS, BNG, ZTP, Docker, Ansible, Prometheus
   

  

 Om Bahnhof
   

  

 Bahnhof är en ledande internetoperatör med bredbands- och nättjänster i teknisk framkant, både för privatpersoner och företag. Vi gillar att utmana gamla sanningar, och söker just nu en kreativ utvecklare som vill vara med när vi expanderar, och bidra till nästa generations nät.
   

  

 Ansökan
   

  

 Mejla ansökan märkt ”Utvecklare Nät” till jobb@bahnhof.net senast den
 **17 januari 2025** 
 , inklusive personligt brev, CV och löneanspråk.
   

  

 Vi genomför intervjuer löpande och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag, så vänta inte för länge! Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten? Hör av dig till Philip Göransson via philip.goransson@bahnhof.net.
   

  

*Tack, men nej tack. Vi undanber oss vänligt men bestämt all kontakt från rekryteringsbolag.*

title: Senior Software Engineer Android
description:
****The role****
 This position is for an exceptional Android developer who is keen to work on Native Apps. You'll be working with great colleagues from diverse backgrounds who are passionate about what they do. This passion will ignite your creativity in a fast-paced yet fun, Agile environment where technology and problem solving are key.
   

  

****Key accountabilities:****
* Develops high quality code using the most appropriate techniques e.g. design patterns
* Designs solutions to meet the requirements (business and tech). Able to challenge and proactively suggest improvement to requirements
* Contributes to best practice, pro-actively looks to improve status quo e.g. can the team improve logging, performance testing etc.
* Focused and engaged in team commitments, takes ownership to help the team reach their goals
* Constructively critique solutions and code of peers
* Actively seeks to automate where relevant with a shift left mindset (catch bugs early during development)
* Follows and implements good practices in quality assurance
* Confidently makes decisions affecting the team


****We use: Skills & Technologies:****
* Kotlin
* Android Jetpack components
* Jetpack Compose
* MVVM design pattern
* Modular architecture Hilt for dependency injection
* Git
* Continuous delivery
* Best development practices
* Agile & lean values


****Your experience:****
* As an experienced Android software engineer, you can drive technical solutions from design to production.
* You are well-versed in modern Android technologies and have written applications in Kotlin.
* You have good knowledge of Kotlin Coroutines, Coroutine Flow, and StateFlow. You have good knowledge of Git.
* You have experience with Android Jetpack components and Jetpack Compose.
* You have experience with the MVVM design pattern.
* You have experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery tools (an advantage).
* You have good knowledge of Hilt for dependency injection.
* You help mentor and onboard new team members.
* You build scalable software and ensure your code works correctly using unit and UI tests.
* You are proactive in communication towards all stakeholders, including the team.


****An advantage:****
* Experience using Agile methodologies
* Knowledge of programming design
* Use of Atlassian tools such as BitBucket, JIRA and Confluence


****What do we offer?****
* A great team with passionate developers
* Mix of Spanish and Swedish culture in an English speaking environment
* Awesome location at Spaces Rio in central Madrid
* Twenty five days paid vacation plus days off for Christmas and New Year's Eve
* Wellbeing allowance
* Pension contributions
* Work from home days each week LI-HYBRID

title: Senior Developer och Tech Lead
description:
*Som senior tech lead hos oss får du chansen att vara drivkraften bakom innovativa lösningar inom Microsoft Power Platform som gör verklig skillnad för våra kunder. I denna roll blir du en viktig del av deras digitala resa – du skapar, anpassar och optimerar lösningar som gör deras medlemssystem både smartare och mer effektiva. Med din tekniska skärpa och förmåga att leda andra genom utmaningar blir du en nyckelspelare för att automatisera arbetsflöden och omvandla data till insikter som tar kunderna till nästa nivå. Letar du efter en dynamisk roll där ditt tekniska kunnande får stort genomslag och driver kundernas framgång? Varmt välkommen till Innofactor!*
**En vardag på Innofactor**
 Som senior techlead hos oss kommer du att ha en nyckelroll i att utveckla, anpassa och optimera lösningar inom Microsoft Power Platform. Vi söker dig med djup teknisk kompetens och ett öga för att skapa lösningar som stödjer våra kunders digitala transformation och medlemssystem. I denna roll bidrar du till att stärka våra kunders innovationskraft och effektivitet genom att automatisera arbetsflöden och förbättra datadrivna insikter, vilket ger dem möjlighet att arbeta smartare och mer effektivt.
 **Det viktigaste för rollen är djupa kunskaper om Dynamics 365 CE och Power Platform.**
* Agera som teknisk mentor för utvecklarna och vägleda dem genom tekniska utmaningar.
* Säkerställa att teamet följer bästa praxis och tekniska standarder för utveckling inom Dynamics 365 och Power Platform.
* Coacha och utbilda teamet i nya verktyg och teknologier relaterade till plattformen.
* Fatta beslut om tekniska detaljer kring hur lösningar ska implementeras
* Lösa tekniska problem som uppstår under utvecklingsprocessen och hitta lösningar på kod- eller systemnivå.
* Proaktivt testa nya funktioner och teknologier inom Dynamics 365 och Power Platform för att säkerställa deras effektivitet i projektet.
* Designa, utveckla och optimera lösningar som bygger på Power Platform-applikationer, såsom Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI och CoPilot Studio.
* Designa och utveckla integrationer mellan Dynamics 365 och andra system (ERP, CRM, tredjeparts applikationer) via verktyg som Azure Logic Apps, Power Automate och API.


**Kan du detta?**
 Vad ser gärna att du har arbetat och har djupgående kompetens inom följande teknologier och verktyg:
   

  

* Dynamics 365 CE och Power Platform
* C#
* .Net
* JS
* VS Code
* git
* Azure
* DevOps.


**Den Vi Söker**
 Du beskriver dig själv som en person som är lyhörd och tydlig i din kommunikation, vilket hjälper dig att bygga förtroende och skapa engagemang. Du tycker att du har ett affärsinriktat synsätt och är prestigelös, och du trivs med att samarbeta över gränser för att nå gemensamma mål. Med en balans mellan det operativa och strategiska drivs du av att förbättra processer och skapa hållbara resultat.
   

  

**Be the real you**
 Hos oss kan du vara dig själv! Här är ingen stöpt i samma form. Vi värdesätter våra medarbetares olikheter och tror att utmanande uppgifter kräver nya och olika perspektiv. Alla har olika kvaliteter, och därför tror vi inte på att skriva ner en lista på egenskaper som vi söker. Det som däremot är viktigt är att du gillar att lösa komplexa problem, sprida kunskap och är självgående. För att trivas i rollen bör du ha god kommunikations- och samarbetsförmåga både på svenska och på engelska. På Innofactor innebär konsultmässighet att du hjälper våra kunder och är ett steg före, vilket gör att du kan föreslå nya lösningar eller utmaningar som du identifierar.

title: Head of Sales & Startup Founder (March 2025)
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals, Software Development, and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Note: This is not for full-time employment, but an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup.** 




  





**Who you are** 




 You are a seasoned sales professional with a proven track record of success. Your expertise extends beyond simply closing deals; you possess the vision and leadership qualities to build a company from the ground up. Whether you're driven by disrupting new markets or leveraging your skills for positive global impact, this opportunity offers you the chance to become a CEO and co-found a groundbreaking company.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Meet Our Nordic Success Stories:** 



* **Wingbits:** 
 Community-driven flight data; redefining air travel efficiency
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture

title: Platform Support Developer
description:
**About the role** 




 Are you a techie who enjoys variation and growth, both personally and professionally? Join a fast-growing, global market leader for an engaging kick-start to your career. As a Platform Support Developer, you will be part of a dedicated team responsible for our unique platform. You will primarily work with 1st, 2nd, and 3rd line support and maintenance support for internal and external SaaS customers. The role includes bug fixes and maintenance with a focus on both Backend and Frontend. The work varies a lot, so you will be handling diverse tasks at the same time, meaning you will keep updated, learn, and develop constantly.
 



 Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. The platform is unique in the sense that it is developed specifically for property management. In a very short time, we have positioned ourselves as a leading and innovative player in the market. We have great plans and tremendous growth and will continue our global expansion.
 



  





**What do we expect of you?** 




 We believe you are a positive, humble and responsible person who enjoys taking your own initiative, who can drive ideas from start to finish, and be a team player. You strive to develop yourself both personally and technically, and you enjoy helping others. You are a great communicator who can explain complex concepts to all kinds of users, no matter their knowledge level.
 



  





**Experience** 



* Ideally, you have a technical background or education.
* Any kind of Customer Service experience.
* Knowledge in programming and/or web development (PHP/Angular).
* A genuine interest in technology.
* Ability to express yourself clearly in English and Swedish both verbally and in writing.
* It’s also great if you have previous experience in technical support.
* Any knowledge from our tech stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP/Slim and Angular), is also very appreciated.



  





**What we offer** 



* Hybrid setting - you'll be part of a team that values collaboration and communication, regardless of location.
* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools and encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
* Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.



  





**Location** 




 We find great value in working closely with our Stockholm-based team in person. At the same time, we understand the need to focus deeply without interruptions. Therefore, the team works according to a hybrid setup, combining the best of both worlds, with the flexibility to work both at the office and from home.
 



  





**Excited?** 




 If you are excited about being part of a successful team, we encourage you to apply for this position. This is a great opportunity to grow your skills and, in the long term, potentially step into a developer role within one of our brilliant product teams.

title: Senior System Software & Firmware Engineer
description:
**Why Join Us?**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. We call this mission Power to Be You. Our assistive communication technology helps our customers express themselves, connect with the world, and pursue independence, whether through everyday activities like ordering food or extraordinary feats like running a company. Working at Tobii Dynavox, you’ll become part of a team that spans the globe, with offices in the US, Sweden, France, the UK, China, and beyond.
   

  

 To learn more about what we make possible, meet some of our customers or take a look at some of our solutions.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 We’re at an exciting stage in our journey—growing rapidly and expanding our Product & Development team in Stockholm to build a vibrant hub for innovation, product design, and technology. This is a unique opportunity to join a thriving organization where you can help shape the future of assistive communication, defining how we work and delivering impactful solutions for our users.
   

  

 We are building a culture of empowered, collaborative teams who are passionate about helping individuals with disabilities find their voice and connect with the world. Our teams thrive on trust, collaboration, and a positive environment where everyone lead and contributes. We deeply understand the people we serve, empathize with their challenges, and use our expertise to make a real difference.
   

  

 As a
 **Senior System Software & Firmware Enginee** 
 r, you will join a team that plays a critical role in the design, development, and maintenance of speech-generating devices and accessories at Tobii Dynavox. In this role, you will create reliable, optimized, and compliant firmware and system software that enables individuals with communication challenges to express themselves effectively. You will work within a cross-functional engineering team, bridging hardware and software to ensure seamless integration, system performance, and adherence to medical device standards. Ultimately, your contributions will deliver high-quality, robust solutions that meet user needs, drive innovation, and align with the company’s mission to empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible.
   

  

 In this role, you will:
   

  

* Lead the development and optimization of firmware for speech-generating devices, integrating subsystems like USB-PD controllers, audio codecs, LCD drivers, and SD cards.
* Collaborate with hardware engineers to bring up new platforms, optimize device drivers, and ensure smooth hardware-software integration. Debug using tools like JTAG debuggers and oscilloscopes.
* Implement custom USB devices (audio class, HID, proprietary protocols) and firmware for USB host controllers to integrate peripherals like eye trackers.
* Design software exposing hardware and firmware functionality via user-friendly APIs and maintain cross-platform integration.
* Analyze and optimize firmware for power, memory, and processing efficiency while ensuring reliability under real-time conditions.
* Work with engineers and DevOps to align on hardware-software integration, testing, and milestones. Collaborate on proprietary protocols for hardware-software interoperability.
* Develop and execute tests to validate firmware and APIs, ensuring system stability and reliability. Support hardware validation in production.
* Contribute to team goals and project delivery as needed.


**What We're Looking For:**
 We are looking for someone that has:
   

  

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field. 8+ years of experience in firmware and system software development for embedded systems.
* Proficient in C/C++ for low-level and real-time firmware development. Extensive experience with ARM-based microcontrollers and interfaces like USB 2.0, I2C, SPI, UART, and CAN.
* Strong understanding of USB 2.0, including multi-function devices, custom endpoints (audio class, HID), and USB host controller integration.
* Proven experience optimizing firmware for power, memory, and performance in resource-constrained environments.
* Expertise in debugging with JTAG debuggers, oscilloscopes, and logic analyzers. Experience in unit tests, integration tests, and hardware validation tools.
* Effective in cross-functional teams, collaborating with hardware, system, QA, and software engineers to meet product goals.
* Experience documenting firmware designs and processes for audit and compliance.


**Our Values:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, our mission guides what we do, and our values guide us in how we do it. Across the organization, we are committed to being Collaborative, Considerate, Curious and Courageous. We build a trusting environment where every team member prioritizes our customers with empathy and insight. Bold ideas and learning lead to impactful solutions. Driven by curiosity, we continuously challenge the status quo to create meaningful, customer-focused solutions for our customers.
   

  

**What We Offer:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we believe in empowering individuals – including our employees - to reach their full potential. Here’s what makes us unique:
   

  

* Purpose-Driven Work: Join a company that transforms lives by giving a voice to those with communication challenges. Every day, your work makes a meaningful and concrete impact.
* “Yes, and...” Flexibility: Build a rewarding career AND enjoy time with loved ones. We offer flexible work options so you don’t have to choose between personal and professional goals.
* Growth and Development: Whether you’re advancing your skills or growing your career, we invest in your future with training, learning opportunities, and internal growth paths.
* Inclusive and Supportive Culture: Work in a collaborative, caring environment where diversity and individuality are valued. You’ll feel connected to both your team and our global community.
* A Global Leader with Heart: Be part of an innovative, forward-thinking company that combines experience and cutting-edge solutions with a mission to change lives.

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
Arbetsplatsbeskrivning
   

  

 Är du redo för en större uppgift? Polismyndigheten är Sveriges största myndighet med ca 40 000 medarbetare varav IT-avdelningen består av drygt 1 200 anställda som ansvarar för all IT som tillhandahålls av myndigheten. Hos oss får du möjlighet att bidra till Polisens uppdrag – att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i samhället.
   

  

 Till gruppen E-tjänster söker vi nu en driven systemutvecklare. Vårt uppdrag är att ta ett helhetsansvar för nyutveckling och förvaltning av Polismyndighetens e-tjänster. Gruppen ansvarar exempelvis för e-tjänster för tillstånd, vapenlicens, anmälningsupptagning och polisens ”Mina sidor” där användare kan ta del av information och utföra ärenden hos polisen.
   

  

 Hos oss på E-tjänster får du möjlighet att:
   

  

* Vara med att bidra till att öka tryggheten och minska brottsligheten i Sverige
* Växa, utvecklas samt bli en del av ett team med drivna utvecklare
* Vi uppmuntrar till balans mellan arbetsliv och privatliv genom bl.a. möjlighet till visst arbete på distans, flexibla arbetstider och goda förutsättningar för träning och återhämtning.


 Arbetsbeskrivning
   

  

 Vi står inför en spännande och händelserik tid med mycket nyutveckling. Som utvecklare hos oss kommer du ingå i ett tvärfunktionellt SCRUM team som arbetar testdrivet och levererar kontinuerligt enligt ”continuous deployment”. Vid utveckling används exempelvis Angular, Java, Spring boot och container platforms. Vi arbetar enligt agila principer och ser det som en självklarhet att hjälpa varandra för att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Relevant akademisk utbildning inom IT, alternativt examen från relevant YH-utbildning, eller att du har motsvarande relevant erfarenhet som
* Polismyndigheten bedömer som likvärdig.
* Minst 1,5 års arbetslivserfarenhet som fullstackutvecklare med Java
* Arbetslivserfarenhet av agil systemutvecklingsmetodik
* Erfarenhet av Angular eller motsvarande
* Erfarenhet av Spring Boot eller motsvarande
* Kunna uttrycka sig väl i tal och skrift på Svenska


 Anställningen kräver svenskt medborgarskap.
   

  

**Meriterande**
* Arbetslivserfanheter från Polismyndigheten och att utveckla polisiära system
* Erfarenhet av testdriven utveckling
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD med Jenkins, Openshift, Dockers eller motsvarande.


**Personliga egenskaper**
 Vi söker dig med personlig drivkraft som är intresserad av att utvecklas inom rollen som systemutvecklare. Du ska vara engagerad, pålitlig och ha ett serviceinriktat förhållningssätt till verksamhet, kollegor och chefer. Du har god samarbetsförmåga, är noggrann och ser till helheten. Att du är nyfiken och intresserad av att följa utvecklingen inom ditt kompetensområde är viktigt för oss. Att leverera med kvalitet är för dig en självklarhet.
   

  

 Vi kommer att lägga mycket stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet då arbetet innebär många kontakter inom myndigheten.
   

  

 Kontaktpersoner
   

  

 Har du frågor om uppdraget är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef via, tfn 010-563 74 10.
   

  

 Har du frågor om rekryteringsprocessen är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig HR-konsult: Hanna Bergquist, hanna.bergquist@polisen.se
   

  

 Fackliga företrädare
   

  

 Polisförbundet, Sofia Ask, tfn: 010-563 87 10
   

  

 SACO, nås via mejl saco-s.avdelningarna@polisen.se
   

  

 SEKO Polisen, Karna Tillheden, tfn: 010-561 66 27
   

  

 ST, Tom Johnsson 076-947 00 30
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 I denna rekrytering kan löpande urval förekomma.
   

  

 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning med provanställning om sex månader
   

  

 Arbetsort: Stockholm
   

  

 Arbetstid: Flextid
   

  

 Tillträde: Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

 Funktion: Systemutvecklare
   

  

 Från och med maj 2024 använder vi inte personligt brev i våra rekryterings-processer. Vi ber dig istället att bifoga ditt CV där du tydligt beskriver på vilket sätt du uppfyller efterfrågade kvalifikationer och meriter kopplat till aktuell rekrytering på svenska. Du kan se den kompletta kravprofilen i jobbannonsen.
   

  

**Utöver CV behöver du även besvara ett antal urvalsfrågor som en del av din ansökan.** 
 Dessa frågor utgår från aktuell kravprofil och ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

**Fyll i följande urvalsenkät.** 
 (pdf, 257 kB)
   

  

 Spara ner urvalsenkäten och bifoga den i mailet med din ansökan/ditt CV. Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället. De uppgifter du lämnar i samband med din ansökan kan användas för att kontakta dig, få information och kallelser samt eventuella anställningshandlingar.
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan i form av CV och besvarade urvalsfrågor via e-post till jobb.na@polisen.se
 **senast den 24 januari 2025** 
 . Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via den mailadress som anges i annonsen.
 **Märk din ansökan med referensnummer A018.226/2025 i mailets ärendemening.**
 Har du skyddade personuppgifter, referenser eller liknande information som du själv bedömer som skyddsvärd rekommenderar vi att du kontaktar ansvarig HR-konsult innan du går vidare med din ansökan.
   

  

 En anställning hos Polismyndigheten kan komma att inledas med en provanställning om sex månader.
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) genomförs innan beslut om anställning fattas. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. Läs mer om krigsplacering och säkerhetsprövning under https://polisen.se/krigsplacering och https://polisen.se/sakerhetsprovning
   

  

 Polismyndigheten kommer att behandla dina personuppgifter i enlighet med reglerna i EU:s dataskyddsförordning (2016/679) och annan tillämplig dataskyddsreglering. Läs mer om vår hantering av personuppgifter på https://polisen.se/personuppgifter/rekrytering
   

  

 Din ansökan är en offentlig handling enligt offentlighetsprincipen.
   

  

**Polismyndigheten**
 Polismyndigheten erbjuder dig en arbetsplats som stimulerar till mångfald, kreativitet och personlig utveckling. Läs gärna om våra förmåner som anställd hos polisen på https://polisen.se/erbjudande
   

  

 Vi bedriver vår verksamhet enligt vår värdegrund: engagemang, effektivitet och tillgänglighet. Som medarbetare inom polisen agerar du för likabehandling. Det är en förutsättning för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och för polisens legitimitet i samhället. Som företrädare för polisen respekterar du allas lika värde och skapar förtroende för polisen.
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om polisen och vår verksamhet på www.polisen.se
   

 www.polisen.se
   

  

**Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**
 Vi undanber oss samtal och mail från dig som vill sälja annons- och rekryteringstjänster.

title: Fullstack Java Career Program, Våren 2025, Stockholm
description:
*Vill du ta nästa steg för att börja din karriär som Java utvecklare? Oavsett om du är självlärd eller har tidigare erfarenhet inom programmering, erbjuder SALT en unik möjlighet att utveckla dina programmeringskunskaper och få betydelsefull arbetslivserfarenhet! Ta chansen att forma din karriär och bli en nyckelspelare i en bransch där din kompetens verkligen gör skillnad!* 




  





**Om Career Program** 




 Detta program är en unik möjlighet för dig som vill utveckla dina programmeringskunskaper och samtidigt stärka de färdigheter som krävs för att lyckas som konsult. Här kombineras avancerad kodning tillsammans med fokus på färdigheter såsom samarbete & intervjuteknik – allt för att göra dig redo för en karriär som professionell utvecklare. Utbildningen pågår under 13 intensiva veckor på plats på vårt kontor på Kungsholmen. Under dessa veckor kommer alla kursare att arbeta tillsammans i team, i form av mob programming.
 



  





 Efter att framgångsrikt ha genomfört utbildningen, kommer säljteamet att presentera dig för externa bolag, såsom Scania, Länsförsäkringar och Atlas Copco. När vi hittat den perfekta matchningen, kommer du att genomföra ett konsultuppdrag tillsammans med SALT.
