title: Teamledare IT Leverans
description:
**Teamledare IT Leverans** **Moelven**
======================================

  

**Om stillingen**
-----------------


Vill du bli en del av ett dynamiskt och affärsdrivet team i en av Skandinaviens största träindustrier?  

  

Som teamledare för Leverans är du en del av Moelvens IT-driftavdelning och har huvudansvaret för att koordinera IT-leveranserna hos Moelvens 33 produktionsbolag i Norge och Sverige. Teamledaren för Leverans arbetar nära andra team inom IT-avdelningen för att lösa lokala behov och tekniska problem ute hos bolagen. Du kommer att ha det operativa ansvaret för lokal infrastruktur och klienter, och genom regelbunden dialog med bolagen säkerställa att den lokala infrastrukturen följer Moelvens standarder. Du kommer att leda ett team på fyra personer som är placerade både i Norge och Sverige. Du rapporterar till IT-driftchefen och ingår i IT-driftens ledningsgrupp.  

  

Vi söker en serviceinriktad och relationsskapande ledare med god teknisk förståelse som är en drivkraft för att vidareutveckla medarbetare, processer och teknik till det bästa för slutanvändaren. Arbetsplatsen kommer att vara vid Moelvens huvudkontor i Skåre, Karlstad. Resor både i Norge och Sverige förväntas.
**Nøkkelinformasjon**
---------------------


Søknadsfrist:
04.02.2025
Arbeidsgiver:
Moelven
Sted:
Karlstad, MOELV
Stillingstittel:
Teamledare IT Leverans
Stillinger:
1
Heltid / Deltid:
Heltid
Ansettelsesform:
Fast
Stillingsprosent:
100
Webcruiter-ID:
4908462842  


**Arbeidsoppgaver**
-------------------

Detta är några av de uppgifter du kommer att arbeta med:

* Leda, motivera och utveckla medarbetare i teamet.
* Regelbundna statusmöten med Moelvens bolag och våra externa leverantörer av IT-lösningar.
* Koordinera och leverera IT-tjänster och infrastruktur ute hos Moelvens bolag.
* Utarbeta och vidareutveckla användar- och driftsdokumentation.
* Bidra till att leverera stabil och säker drift av en hybrid teknologiplattform.


**Kvalifikasjoner**
-------------------

* Vi söker en serviceinriktad och motiverande ledare med IT-utbildning och erfarenhet från IT-drift, IT-leverans eller systemadministration. Du bidrar med engagemang, både professionellt och socialt, och du trivs med att lösa uppgifter både självständigt och i team. Du har en stark teknisk bakgrund och förmåga att utveckla människor, processer och teknik till det bästa för slutanvändaren.  

  

Det är en fördel om du har erfarenhet av en eller flera av följande:
* Ledarerfarenhet, gärna av distribuerade team.
* Förståelse för nätverk och säkerhet.
* Ramverk för IT-tjänstestyrning (ITSM), ITIL eller liknande.
* Agila metoder.
* Windows server- och klientinfrastruktur.
* M365, Windows och Atlassian-produkter (Jira/Confluence).
* Virtualiseringsteknik.  

  

Tjänsten innebär huvudsakligen kommunikation på norska och svenska, men du måste också kunna behärska engelska väl.


**Personlige egenskaper**
-------------------------

**Vi tilbyr**
-------------

En nyckelroll i ett koncern i stark utveckling och i en solid och hållbar verksamhet! På Moelven tror vi att just DU gör skillnaden genom att bidra med engagemang, ta eget ansvar och utveckla både verksamheten, dig själv och andra. Du får frihet, befogenheter och mandat att påverka. Vi erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga villkor och har fokus på HMS, kontinuerlig förbättring och trivsel på jobbet.

  

Moelven är en av Skandinaviens ledande leverantörer av byggprodukter och tillhörande tjänster. Koncernen består av 33 produktionsbolag fördelade på 41 produktionsplatser i Norge och Sverige. Moelven har också ett större antal kontor för marknad, försäljning, service och montering, 3 300 anställda och en omsättning på 12,9 miljarder NOK.  

  

Moelvens IT-avdelning består av totalt 42 personer – varav 16 arbetar med infrastruktur, drift och support, och 26 arbetar inom IT-säkerhet, applikationsutveckling/-stöd och projektledning.

  


  

  

**Adresse:** **Skårevägen 60, 653 50 Karlstad, Sverige**
--------------------------------------------------------

  

**Kontaktinformasjon**
----------------------

**Ida Marie Frøseth**
Leder IT Drift
Telefon: +47 97609772

title: Cloud Engineer till Hubexo
description:
Hubexo befinner sig på en spännande tillväxtresa där vi ständigt utvecklas för att förbli både kunders och medarbetares självklara val i branschen. Vi är ambitiösa i allt vi åtar oss och expanderar kontinuerligt till nya regioner och segment för att stärka vår position som det ledande mjukvaru- och informationsföretaget inom bygg, fastighet och sjukvård. Koncernen omsätter cirka 2 miljarder SEK och har över 2 000 anställda i 26 olika länder.


Läs mer om oss här: About - Hubexo

**Om rollen:**


Du kommer att arbeta i plattforms teamet som bygger Hubexos framtida plattform för alla nya produkter. Teamet arbetar tvärfunktionellt och agilt och består av 6 personer som sitter i Sverige, England, Portugal och Australien. Du kommer att rapportera direkt till Platform Team Lead och sitter på vårt kontor i Stockholm.


Som Cloud Engineer kommer du att:

* Vara en nyckelspelare i en av våra viktigaste satsningar just nu.
* Bidra till design och leverans av molnbaserade lösningar enligt Infrastructure-as-Code-principer.
* Administrera CI/CD-system och skapa build-konfigurationer samt pipelines.
* Vara en aktiv del av ett agilt team och bidra till att vidareutveckla våra arbetssätt.
* Kommunicera komplexa tekniska koncept på ett tydligt sätt till olika målgrupper.
* Hantera flera parallella aktiviteter och fatta snabba beslut vid behov.

**Vår teknik:**

* + **Molnplattform:** AWS
	+ **Verktyg och tjänster:** Terraform, SQS, Kubernetes, RDS, Lambda
	+ **Produktstack:** Node.js, Python, React, TypeScript, PostgreSQL

**Om Dig:**

* Du har en ingenjörsutbildning på högskola/universitet och har troligtvis utvecklat projekt vid sidan av dina studier eller ditt arbete.
* Du har 4-10 års arbetslivserfarenhet som Cloud Engineer eller DevOps Engineer.


Som person är du lösnings orienterad och trivs med att ta eget ansvar samtidigt som du har lätt för att samarbeta i team. Du är analytisk och strukturerad, vilket gör att du snabbt kan sätta dig in i komplexa tekniska utmaningar och hitta effektiva, långsiktiga lösningar.


Ditt pedagogiska sätt gör att du kan kommunicera tekniska koncept på ett sätt som är lättförståeligt för både tekniska och icke-tekniska målgrupper, vilket gör dig till en uppskattad samarbetspartner. Din nyfikenhet och vilja att utvecklas driver dig att hålla dig uppdaterad inom det senaste inom teknikområdet, vilket bidrar till att skapa värde för verksamheten.


**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**


För rätt person finns det många spännande möjligheter inom hela Hubexo-koncernen. Till exempel finns det goda möjligheter att på sikt växa in i en mer senior roll inom bolaget med större ansvar.


Om du har passion för det du gör, är engagerad i dina åtaganden, uthållig och pålitlig kommer jag att göra allt jag kan för att skapa rätt förutsättningar för att du ska få en lång och rolig karriär hos oss.


Utöver det erbjuder vi:

* Konkurrenskraftig lön
* Tjänstepension (ITP1)
* 30 dagars semester

title: (Senior) IT Asset and Configuration Manager – based in Luxembourg
description:
This position is based at our Luxembourg headquarters and requires regular office presence. The EIB offers you the opportunity to live and work in a truly international and multi-cultural environment. We also offer relocation support.
   

  

 The
 **EIB** 
 , the European Union's bank, is seeking to recruit for its
 **Group Corporate Services Directorate – Group Digital Office (GCS-GDO) – Platforms & Services Department (P&S) – Operations & Service Desk Division (OSDK) – Operations and ITIL Processes Unit (OIP)** 
 at its headquarters in Luxembourg, a
 **(Senior) IT Asset and Configuration Manager \*** 
 .
   

  

**This is a full-time position at grade 5/6 for which the EIB offers a permanent contract.**
***Panel interviews are anticipated for***
***February 2025***
***.***
* internal benchmark: (Senior) Engineer IT Technology & Infrastructure


 Purpose
   

  

 Would you like to drive asset and configuration management of ITIL practices (Information Technology Infrastructure Library) for IT Service Management (ITSM) in the EU Climate Bank? We’re looking for a dedicate individual who will help us make further impact. Join us in our journey of driving the digitalization of the Bank!
   

  

 Operating Network
   

  

 You will report to the Head of Operations and ITIL Process Unit, responsible for providing IT services for operations and operational processes.
   

  

 Given the operational risk linked to some processes, it is required that all team members can act as back-up for other team members for ITIL processes.
   

  

 Accountabilities
   

  

* Propose and develop IT processes and services in IT asset and configuration management policies and processes
* Manage, implement, refine, and enforce the IT asset and configuration management policies and processes to support the overall IT strategy
* Establish formal CMDB governance model and monitor the Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
* Implement best practices to support a collection of up-to-date and inter-related configuration items in CMDB about IT infrastructure, applications and services
* Drive CMBD transformation to align with ITIL best practices
* In collaboration with the CMDB Solution provider, define and implement all mechanisms needed to ensure full control of the product owners Configurable Items (CI)
* Coordinate and evaluate strategic and complex projects and activities in own domain
* Review service delivery to ensure that agreed targets are met and that identified actions to maintain or improve levels of service are implemented
* Provide expert advice and recommendations to find appropriate solutions and actions in the own area
* Develop, establish, and maintain constructive and trustful relationships, as well as efficient communication, with all internal and external stakeholders (e.g., customer, consultants, service providers and other services in the EIB)


**Qualifications**
* University degree (minimum an equivalent to a Bachelor) preferably in Computer Science, Information Systems, or similar relevant fields.
* At least 5 years of relevant experience in managing ITIL processes with a focus on IT Asset/Change/Release/Configuration Management
* Experience in working with or leading technical teams in the context of IT Service Management would be highly appreciated
* ITIL Foundation Certification is required.
* Demonstrated of IT asset and configuration management experience in a large-scale, multi-platform environment, supporting 24x7 operations.
* Familiarity with IT infrastructure and BMC Smart IT/Helix would be an advantage
* Experience in working with multicultural and international teams, preferably working successfully with external service providers in a multisource environment
* ITIL Specialist Certification : Create, Deliver & Support certification or similar would be a distinct advantage
* Excellent knowledge of English and/or French (\*\*), with a good command of the other. Knowledge of other EU languages would be an advantage.


 Competencies
   

  

*Find out more about EIB core competencies* 
 here
   

  

*(\*\*) Unless stated explicitly as a required qualification, a good command of French is not a pre-requisite for hire. As both English and French are however official working languages of the EIB, proficiency in both languages is a pre-requisite for your future career development. Any language clause in your contract must be fulfilled in order for you to be eligible for a promotion (either via the annual appraisal cycle or via an internal selection process). Proficiency is understood to mean the attainment of* 
*level 5 of the Inter Institutional language courses, corresponding to B1.2 of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFRL). The Bank offers appropriate training support.*
 We are an equal opportunities employer, who believes that diversity is good for our people and our business. We encourage all suitably qualified and eligible candidates to apply regardless of their gender identity/expression, age, racial, ethnic and cultural background, religion and beliefs, sexual orientation/identity, disability or neurodiversity.
   

  

 To find out more about our eligibility criteria click here
   

  

 Applicants with specific needs are encouraged to request reasonable accommodations at any stage during the recruitment process. Please contact the EIB Recruitment team Jobs@eib.org who will ensure that your request is handled.
   

  

 By applying for this position, you acknowledge the importance of maintaining the security and integrity of the Information of the EIB Group. In case of selection for the position you agree to comply with all measures (policies, controls, document classification and management) implemented by the EIB Group to prevent unauthorised disclosure of any information or any damage to the EIB Group reputation
   

  

**Deadline for applications: This is an open campaign to consecutively fill open positions. The campaign will remain open until position is filled. Applications will be reviewed in order of receipt.**

title: Treasury and Technology Consultant
description:
Zanders in Stockholm, Sweden is growing and expanding our team. Are you looking to elevate your career and to deliver performance that counts? If so, join our global financial consulting evolution!
   

  

**Your role:**
 As a Treasury Technology Consultant at Zanders, you will have the opportunity to dive into live projects almost immediately, gaining valuable insights from our diverse team of international consultants and first-class business trainers. We are looking for talented and technically skilled graduates who are enthusiastic about the intersection of technology and finance and eager to grow within the treasury world. You will have the chance to guide and implement treasury solutions for large multinational corporations, both locally and internationally. If you are an entrepreneurial spirit and keen to contribute to the evolving vision at Zanders, this role is perfect for you!
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Collaborate with clients to identify how technology fits into their strategic roadmap,
* Review how clients use financial technology, identify best practice improvements, and implement those changes,
* Work together with experienced colleagues to help manage the project success and align with client expectations,
* Advance the project work by completing assigned tasks or providing client support,
* Decide which market trends and legislation to research so that you can develop your own expertise within Zanders.


**Skills to be successful:**
* Completed Master’s in a relevant study such as Finance, Business Administration, Economics, or Information Systems,
* Interested in a career in finance and technology, with a specialized focus in treasury and corporate risk management solutions,
* Motivated to work on projects with change management and a systems/process focus,
* Drawn to a career in consulting, that involves specialization, emotional intelligence, and interpersonal collaboration,
* Fluent in Swedish and English; both written and spoken.


**We offer:**
* A hybrid work environment, that promotes a healthy work-life balance,
* Participation in the Zanders bonus scheme,
* Secure your future with a pension scheme,
* Zanders has taken out several insurances for the benefit of the employee
* 28 paid holiday days,
* A laptop and an iPhone,
* An entrepreneurial culture that values personal development, with ample room for initiatives,
* Expertise in your chosen field, building skills rapidly alongside diverse clients and consultants,
* A truly collegiate environment with enthusiastic and helpful colleagues, fostering career excellence in Treasury, Risk or Technology,
* An international and fun working environment, Cultural night events, annual Zanders's trip to a (surprise) location in Europe and many more exciting experiences to come!


**About Us:** 
 Progress your career with Zanders.
   

  

 We are a global financial consulting firm focused on Treasury, Risk and Technology. From our HQ in the Netherlands, we have been expanding our presence in Europe, UK, USA, and Asia. For 30 years we have been providing innovative solutions embracing the latest technological advancements to multinational corporations, financial institutions, public sector entities and NGOs. We go beyond conventional boundaries, delving into new market segments to uncover untapped opportunities. As pioneers in Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) principles and practices, we support our clients to achieve their ESG goals.
   

  

 At Zanders we invest in our people for an inclusive atmosphere, where freedom, fun, and collaboration are pivotal and set us apart, defining our success. We believe that diversity, equity, and inclusion (DE&I) are essential to establish a strong and sustainable business, fostering a culture that values and respects diversity in all forms. Zanders is not just a workplace – it is a supportive community.
   

  

 We invite those who share our passion for collaboration, growth, and positive impact to join us on this journey. If you're in search of a workplace which nurtures personal and professional development, Zanders is the perfect fit for you.
   

  

 Join us as we continue to shape the future of consultancy, making a meaningful impact in the world of Treasury, Risk, and Technology!
   

  

*By applying for a role at Zanders, you give us approval to use and retain your personal details. Considering Zanders’ nature of enterprise, you are expected to behave to a high moral standard. A Pre-Employment Screening (PES) by a third party is part of the application process.*

title: Tech Lead/Product Manager/Future CPO
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Are you ready to take the leap and become the cornerstone of our product journey? We’re on the hunt someone to become our first ever future CPO, someone who is not only passionate about product management and technology but also ready to shape the future of our company.
 



  





 Your current title might be Tech Lead, Product Manager - or something similar – and to us your title is less important than the responsibilities you would like to take on. However, we’re looking for someone who sees the bigger picture - someone who can grow into the role of 
 **CPO.** 
  
 



  





 We need a 
 **pragmatic problem-solver** 
  who can balance visionary thinking with hands-on execution. One moment, you might be strategizing about our next big product feature; the next, you’re diving into code to solve a critical challenge.  
 



  
 



  




 Responsibilities: 
 
  





 Here are some of the responsibilities you can expect: 
 


* Responsibility to manage, prioritize and follow up our product roadmap
* Responsibility for sprint planning and daily standups
* Build and recruit for our Swedish tech team
* Manage our offshored team of developers
* Report to our CTO



  
 



  




 Requirements: 
 
  




* Minimum 6-8 years of experience within software development and leadership within software product development - preferably also from the Product Management side of things
* Deep understanding of how to translate customer needs into product innovation
* Experience from SaaS oriented businesses
* Experience from data intensive businesses
* Background as a full stack developer: Linux, NodeJS, Python, MongoDB, NoSQL, Azure, Azure DevOps, Databricks
* Experience from working with web technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.JS, HTML, CSS
* Fluency in Swedish and English



  
 



  




 And it would be a great plus, but not a must, if you also have: 
 
  




* Experience from mobility, EV (Electric Vehicle) Charging Services, Energy Management, Energy Markets, or other fields related to our business
* Experience in communication solutions as MQTT, OCPP, OCPI
* Experience with frameworks like React, Angular and Webpack
* Experience with Google Maps Platform
* Experience with GCP
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines and Azure
* Familiarity with Kubernetes in a cloud setting (Azure or AWS)



  
 



  




 What we offer: 
 
  




* Choose between being based in Stockholm or Östergötland (Norrköping)
* Competitive WFH policy: We are flexible and work from where we need to be
* The opportunity to shape your role and grow with it in an environment that is ours to define together
* A promise that we will never, ever perform a personality test on you to determine the color of your personality
* Yearly health benefits
* Yearly educational allowance



  





  
 


**Start date** 

 Flexible
 



  
 


**Application** 

 Skip the traditional resume and send an e-mail to career@vialumina.ai containing a link to your updated LinkedIn profile, along with your earliest start date.
 



  
 


 Questions
 
 If you have any questions about the role, please reach out to Patrik Lindergren, CTO at: patrik.lindergren[@]vialumina.ai
 



  
 


 Privacy Notice
 
 By sending your application as above, you consent to have your personal data stored with Vialumina AB for six months before being deleted from our servers. In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access your data and withdraw your consent at any time. Should you wish to do so, please reach out to info[@]vialumina.ai – please, do not add any sensitive information to your application. 
 



  
 


 Recruiters and Consultant Managers 
 
 Please note that this is an application for a permanent position and we are currently not seeking consultants to fill the role. We are also not on the lookout for recruitment support.

title: Infrastruktur och Operations
description:
